text: Zakaria dong sinan bak mihrab Seumbahyang hadap ubak Potallah Teuma geumeuhoi le malaikat Cit troh ban hajat hai Nabiyullah Tuhan kheun Yahya aneuk di gata Nyang that mulia disisi Allah Gopnyan peubeuna kalimah Tuhan Pangulee insan gopnyan lom sudah Saba raya that Nabi nyang saleh Tuhan peuleubeh raya that tuah
